sentences.en: After an altercation, they arrested Younis Tsouli ( pictured above ).
sentences.cn: 一阵争吵过后, 警察逮捕了younistsouli ( 上图 ).

sentences.en: Altercation is a formal word and indicates a noisy argument.
sentences.cn: 是个文雅的词,意为吵吵嚷嚷的争辩.

sentences.en: At which point did you get into a verbal altercation with the two Marine captains?
sentences.cn: 在什么情况下你和两个海军陆战队上校发生了口角?

sentences.en: I could not fill their papers with private altercation, in which they had no concern.
sentences.cn: 我不能在他们的报纸上连篇累牍地刊登与之无关的私人争吵.

sentences.en: I had a slight altercation with some people who objected to our filming.
sentences.cn: 我和一些反对我们拍摄的人发生了小小的口角。

sentences.en: Only occasionally a hubbub of altercation rises to the skies.
sentences.cn: 只是偶然发生口角,大声地吵闹.

sentences.en: Policeman: Has the child an altercation with a drunken or mentally ill member of his family?
sentences.cn: 警察: 这孩子是不是和家里喝醉了酒的人或是精神不正常的人发生了口角?

sentences.en: The boys had an altercation over the umpire's decision.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们对裁判的判决颇有争议.

sentences.en: They an altercation about a trifle.
sentences.cn: 他们为一点小事“争吵”起来.
